trans-unit.source: Determines the alignment of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.

Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is to be anchored toward the left or top end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, depending on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> orientation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 방향에 따라 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />의 왼쪽이나 위쪽 끝에 고정되도록 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> is <see langword="Yes" />, items marked as <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Left" /> are aligned to the right side of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> 값이 <see langword="Yes" />이면 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Left" />로 표시된 항목은 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />의 오른쪽에 맞춰집니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is to be anchored toward the right or bottom end of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, depending on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> orientation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 방향에 따라 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />의 오른쪽이나 아래쪽 끝에 고정되도록 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> is <see langword="Yes" />, items marked as <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Right" /> are aligned to the left side of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft" /> 값이 <see langword="Yes" />이면 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment.Right" />로 표시된 항목은 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />의 왼쪽에 맞춰집니다.
